meanings.definition: The quality or state of being homogeneous.
meanings.sent1: The homogeneousness of the mixture made it easy to blend all the ingredients together.
meanings.sent2: The homogeneousness of the paint ensured a smooth and even finish on the wall.
meanings.sent3: The homogeneousness of the team's performance was so consistent that they won every game without fail.
meanings.sent4: The homogeneousness of the music group's voices created a harmonious and unified sound.
meanings.sent5: The homogeneousness of the colors in the painting gave it a sense of balance and unity.

meanings.definition: The property of having a uniform structure or composition.
meanings.sent1: The homogeneousness of the fabric made it easy to sew without any irregularities.
meanings.sent2: The homogeneousness of the alloy ensured its strength and durability.
meanings.sent3: The homogeneousness of the cake batter made it rise evenly in the oven.
meanings.sent4: The homogeneousness of the forest canopy created a serene and peaceful atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The homogeneousness of the population's beliefs led to a strong sense of community.
